town, lived a little girl named Lily. She liked to wake up early and play with her toys. Her mom always told her to use kind words when talking to others.
One day, Lily went outside to play with her friends. They started to play a fun game, but soon it was getting late. The sky turned dark, and Lily's mom called her to come home. Lily did not want to stop playing, so she did not listen to her mom.
As Lily stayed outside in the dark, she got lost and could not find her way home. She started to cry and wished she had listened to her mom.

long she was having so much fun that she started to feel quite dizzy!
She stumbled around trying to keep her balance and just as she was about to lose control, Lucy heard the voice of her mum telling her to slow down. She quickly slowed to a stop, her head spinning and her shadow glowing in the afternoon sunlight.
As her dizziness subsided, Lucy's mum helped her off the scooter and gave her a big hug. With a smile, they both watched as Lucy's shadow danced away and she went back to safer zipping around the garden in her red scooter!
